name: Chick Chaser
summary:
In the style of the Leisure Suit Larry series this game puts us on the shoes of Andrew Gourdo, a guy that has been dumped by his girlfriend and must get her back with the help of a friend. A part of the plan involves scoring with some of the university chicks. 
 
The gameplay is like a classic adventure game. You have some actions at your disposal (walk, take, give, talk, etc.) and must solve puzzles to make the plot advance. There is also a point-based ranking system similar to the one in the first Leisure Suit Larry games. You can complete the girl quests in whatever order you want, and in that sense the game isn't linear. 
 
Described as a romantic comedy, this game has some soft sexual content.
